title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.61 - Leaving vehicles unattended without turning off motor and setting brakes prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.61 - Leaving vehicles unattended without turning off motor and setting brakes prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall leave a vehicle unattended in the
terminal without having first turned off its motor and set its parking
brakes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
